publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2803 Trish Godman: Fair Trade Fortnight-That the Parliament warmly welcomes Fair Trade Fortnight (4-17 March 2002); believes that Fair Trade activity, encouraged as it is by Oxfam Scotland and other non-governmental organisations and agencies, performs a valuable role in assisting with the setting up of women's co-operatives, small businesses and village enterprises throughout the developing world which provide important economic and social assistance to the families and communities of those involved in such productive activities, and commends the shops and stores which sell Fair Trade products and individual shoppers, local authorities, schools and churches who buy such products.
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-2803 Trish Godman: Fair Trade Fortnight-That the Parliament warmly welcomes Fair Trade Fortnight (4-17 March 2002); believes that Fair Trade activity, encouraged as it is by Oxfam Scotland and other non-governmental organisations and agencies, performs a valuable role in assisting with the setting up of women's co-operatives, small businesses and village enterprises throughout the developing world which provide important economic and social assistance to the families and communities of those involved in such productive activities, and commends the shops and stores which sell Fair Trade products and individual shoppers, local authorities, schools and churches who buy such products. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Maureen Macmillan, Tommy Sheridan*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Shona Robison*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Sarah Boyack*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Iain Smith*, Robin Harper*, Johann Lamont*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Jackie Baillie*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Robert Brown*, Elaine Smith*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Alasdair Morgan*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2803 Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 27 February 2002) Susan Deacon*
